## NestedFlowSelection.afterRemoval() method

Transforms the current selection so that its intended boundary is preserved after the specified range was inserted.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
afterRemoval(range: FlowRange, mine: boolean): FlowSelection | null;
```
